beer.name: Dad's Little Helper
beer.description: This ain't your Dad's malt liquor. Brewmaster John Maier has Roguerized the recipe by adding 40% Midwest corn, lightly hopping it with Oregon Crystal Hops, and then lagering it at a warmer temperature to help bring out the sweet, crisp flavors of the corn.
beer.yeast: Czech Pils Yeast & Free Range Coastal Water.
